message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe is of great value. I'm asking for $1500000 for it.  I'm confident this product can be a great asset for you, but I'm open to discussing the price further.

Alice,  $1500000 is significantly higher than my budget.  I'm very interested in your product, but I can only offer $800000 at this time. This is my maximum, and I'm confident this product is worth it to me at this price.

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product.  While $800000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to compromise.  I'm confident this product will be very valuable to you, and I'm prepared to lower my price to $1200000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise.  While $1200000 is still a bit high, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  I'll offer $1000000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price, considering the value you mentioned.
